attributes.action: Force Peter Hain to resign now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Hain has broken the law, whether intentionally or not, and should be judged by exactly the same standards as members of the general public.  As he is patently guilty of a criminal act and he should immediately be disbarred from public office.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
